class.name: Phaser.Particles

parameters.name: game
parameters.help: A reference to the currently running game.

class.help: Phaser.Particles is the Particle Manager for the game. It is called during the game update loop and in turn updates any Emitters attached to it.

public.name: add
public.help: Adds a new Particle Emitter to the Particle Manager.

parameters.name: emitter
parameters.help: The emitter to be added to the particle manager.

public.name: remove
public.help: Removes an existing Particle Emitter from the Particle Manager.

protected.name: update
protected.help: Called by the core game loop. Updates all Emitters who have their exists value set to true.

public.name: game
public.inlineHelp: A reference to the currently running Game.
